co.cask.cdap.api.service.http

Interface HttpServiceRequest


  • public interface HttpServiceRequest
    Interface with methods for processing HTTP requests.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,List<String>> getAllHeaders() 
      ByteBuffer getContent() 
      String getHeader(String key) 
      List<String> getHeaders(String key)
      Returns all of the values for a specified header
      String getMethod() 
      String getRequestURI() 

    • Method Detail

      • getMethod

        String getMethod()
        Returns:
        the method of this request

      • getRequestURI

        String getRequestURI()
        Returns:
        the URI of this request

      • getContent

        ByteBuffer getContent()
        Returns:
        the data content of this request

      • getAllHeaders

        Map<String,List<String>> getAllHeaders()
        Returns:
        all headers of this request; each header name can map to multiple values

      • getHeaders

        List<String> getHeaders(String key)
        Returns all of the values for a specified header
        Parameters:
        key - the header to find
        Returns:
        all of the values for that header; an empty list will be returned if there is no such header

      • getHeader

        @Nullable
String getHeader(String key)
        Parameters:
        key - the header to find
        Returns:
        the value of the specified header; if the header maps to multiple values, return the first value; if there is no such header, a null value will be returned.
